General.Name: Umpas Holding AS
General.Description: Umpas Holding A.S. engages in the production and sell of ceramic products. It is also involved in the insurance and construction activities, as well as assembly maintenance sectors; and manufactures and markets machinery. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Usak, Turkey.
General.Address: Köme Mahallesi Taslak Sokak No:9/A, Usak, Turkey
